content: to complete this you will need to know the following stitches sl knot and chain single_crochet slip_stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet for this rose i used caron simply soft yarn in autumn red color #9730 and a 3 5mm us e hook the completed rose will measure about 4 5 across this rose pattern was the foundation idea for the 7 roses http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/seven-roses but is larger than those with several variations
